name: tny
title: Tny
description: Shorten links with Tny by Chief Tools.
author: stayallive

commands.name: shorten-selected-url-and-copy
commands.title: Shorten Selected URL and Copy to Clipboard
commands.subtitle: Tny
commands.description: This command shortens the selected URL and copies it to the clipboard

commands.name: shorten-selected-url-and-replace
commands.title: Shorten and Replace Selected URL
commands.subtitle: Tny
commands.description: This command shortens and replaces the selected URL with the shortened URL
